sentences.sContent: She darted a sly sideways glance at Bramwell.
sentences.sCn: 她狡猾地斜瞟了布莱威尔一眼。

trans.tranCn: 投掷，投射；使迅速突然移动
trans.tranOther: If you dart a look at someone or something, or if your eyes dart to them, you look at them very quickly

trans.tranCn: 飞镖，标枪；急驰，飞奔；（虫的）螯；飞快的移动
trans.tranOther: a small pointed object that is thrown or shot as a weapon, or one that is thrown in the game of darts
